attributes.content: 10:21 AM Rhodes Island Training Ground
This is it!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Too slow!
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Shit!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: But...!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: That's enough for today.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Phew....
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Not bad, Fang. You blocked it this time.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: I'm glad to see you getting more flexible.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Yeah, it's what Instructor Dobermann taught me. Not just about footwork, but about adjusting my speed. I think I'm starting to get the hang of it!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Right. You have your natural Kuranta speed. It's good for quick attacks, but those aren't worth anything if the enemy blocks them and you have no counter.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Anyway, you passed this field exercise.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Thanks, Instructor Grace!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: But the next one will be even harder.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: I'll be ready!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: That's the spirit.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Fang~
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Beagle, did you finish your test? How did it go?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Aw, I didn't pass.... Instructor Fallon has some real sneaky tricks...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Don't get discouraged. You'll get 'em next time.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: How about you? Did you pass?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Nice...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Aww, my butt...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Kroos, are you okay?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Instructor Tess shot my patootie...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: The test was a sniper war between me and Instructor Tess. We had to hide and find each other. I still don't know how she got behind me!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Don't laugh at me, Uncle Grace!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'll tell you, you got really unlucky. The other sniping instructors just happen to be out for a few days and you got stuck with Tess.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Even I can't keep track of that phantom. My advice is you put the same effort into finding a sniper nest that you do into finding places to nap.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. Laugh it up.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I just checked on Hibiscus and Lava. Lava passed, but Hibiscus didn't. They went home already. How did you do?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Fang passed.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Aw, Fang, you traitor!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Why am I a traitor?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Ugh, I failed again. What is wrong with me...?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Don't be discouraged, Beagle, we still have plenty of chances.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yeah, it's just a quiz. Nothing to be too upset about. And we still have hell this afternoon.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Haha, that's right. Dobermann let us do your individual tests this morning. But the afternoon group field test? That's all her.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: *Sigh* Please. I can already imagine the look on Instructor Dobermann's face when she sees my test results.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Now you're sorry?
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: No. Instructor Dobermann said we could go at our own pace. I'm just a late bloomer!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hah hah.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: But I'm also worried she'll be disappointed in us...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Beagle, Kroos.....
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Okay, seriously, don't be too hard on yourselves. We didn't make these tests so you could pass them. They're there to tell us what to work on.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Wow. It feels awful when a guy tells you straight to your face that he's better than you. And you can't even do anything about it!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's the truth. There's a huge skill gap between you trainees and us instructors.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: That's why we're your teachers. That's what we're here for.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: And even if you haven't noticed it yourselves, you've made huge strides since you came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: ...He's right.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yeah... I guess he is.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: And really, you girls are doing great. The instructors you went up against are all experts in your respective fields.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Do you have any idea how we got where we are? What we've been through?
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: No way...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yes. Dobermann alone trained us.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Hard to believe as it may be, Dobermann today is a hundred times softer than she used to be.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Huh? Are we talking about the same Dobermann? She's soft?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That's not funny, Uncle Grace.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm not kidding.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Grace! My abuela runs up a mountain with a pack twice that size! You really can't handle some light jogging?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Fallon, you want the enemy to die laughing? Is that what you're going for with these clumsy slapstick attacks?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Tess, you falling asleep on me? Hold your gun straight! Don't let me out of your sights!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Viktor, the enemy doesn't give water breaks!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Leah, let's have you learn some basic first aid before you try healing Arts. This bandage work is as much of a mess as you are.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: We're done for the day. Give me ten laps around the training room! You hear me?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Sir, yes, sir!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: I can't hear you!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: SIR, YES, SIR!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: That bad, huh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The point is still that Dobermann may not be the strongest fighter herself.... Hey, I'll toot my own horn and say I've got a 50/50 shot against her at this point.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Come on, cut the crap.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hey, a little self-confidence is good for the soul.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Anyway, Dobermann may not be the strongest fighter around, but the tactics and strategies she pulled out of her time with the Bolívarian army are overpowering.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Bolívar....?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yeah. Like the 'Bolívarian Civil War' you see on the news. That Bolívar. We all wonder exactly how Dobermann got to be as great as she is, but she never talks that much about her time in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Anyway, at the time, Rhodes Island was just getting going, and they really needed some talent. Then, how do I put this...
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Dobermann was a real soldier back then.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: What does that mean?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Like, we're all pretty awesome here at Rhodes Island, but our overall atmosphere is still really relaxed, right? We get to have our own lives.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Okay, let me put it this way. If you were with us back then, Kroos, you'd never end up napping in a utility closet. The thought wouldn't even cross your mind.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Huh? That sounds like hell.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You get what I'm saying? Dobermann's way different now.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Really. It's hard to imagine the person Instructor Grace is talking about is our Instructor Dobermann.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yeah... Dobermann works us hard, and she's kind of scary, but once you get to know her, you can tell she really cares about us.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: She always really cared about people. Even back then.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: It's just, sometimes, what you do means more than why you do it.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: All right, that's enough chatting for now. You girls pack up, go take a shower, have lunch, and get ready for the group training this afternoon.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Me? I'm going to gather up the other teachers and we'll take your test results to Dobermann.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Oh, I can do that for you.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Really? You can?
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Sure. We'll pass Instructor Dobermann's room on the way to the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Oh. I'll go too.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Um, I'll pass. I'm in no hurry to see Instructor Dobermann.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Thanks a lot, ladies.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Oh, and uh, don't tell Dobermann what I just told you. Ever.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Oh? What are you two doing here?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: We're bringing you some test results, and I guess some other information from Instructor Grace.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I passed!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Let's see here... Oh, good.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: The others.... Kroos, Beagle, and Hibiscus didn't pass. Did Lava?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Sorry....
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It's okay, you're making progress.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Go on back and tell Kroos to be ready for this afternoon.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ahahahaha.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Go on. Rest up.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Hey, Instructor Dobermann, are you cleaning your room?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yes. I do so regularly.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Can I help you?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Huh? Why?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Um. Sometimes you want to give back to your teacher, you know?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Oh, I'll help too!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Er, unless we'd get in the way?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: ...No, not at all. I'm just a little surprised. I thought you were scared of me.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: No way! I have a lot of respect for you, Instructor.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Me too!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: All right. I'll take the help. Thanks.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Fang & Beagle

attributes.content: There's a lot more stuff in here than I expected...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Oh? Is that odd?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: No. I just always thought of you as an instructor with a tidy room, the type who wouldn't keep a lot of stuff.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: ....I really didn't bring much with me when I first came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But I've been living here for a few years now.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh, right. Instructor Dobermann joined Rhodes Island a long time ago?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yes, compared to most operators. It's been a while.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Why did you join up, Instructor?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. Is that a bad question?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: No. It's just, now's not the time. We'll talk about it later.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Are you curious too?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Eh? Yes... I am! I really want to know more about you, Instructor.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Know more about me... huh?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Might as well start on the wardrobe...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Hey, Instructor Dobermann, is this a uniform?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Huh? Yes.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: It's a souvenir I kept from my time in the Army.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Wow, it's very cool.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It is.... So which side did you fight on?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: You know a bit about Bolívar, huh?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And don't I remember that Beagle is also of Bolívarian origin? You immigrated to Columbia, is that right?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes, but I've only heard about Bolívar from my parents. I'd love to hear more about it.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Oh, but it's not like I just came because...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Relax. Even if you did, it's okay.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Come help me with the bedding.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: There we go. Thanks.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: There are currently three factions in Bolívar. The nominal, official government is a puppet controlled by Leithanien, since they led the forces that won the war against Columbia.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Then the Autonomous Government resulted from a parliamentary split. They've been looking for a chance to seize power. They're well-funded, and offer a challenge to the puppet government.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Last, we have the Bolívarian Resistance, an uprising made up of ordinary people fed up with the struggles of the powerful.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I served the Autonomous Government, at the rank of colonel.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Wow, a colonel! Instructor Dobermann is awesome!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: That's a high rank.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: .....Yes. It is.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I'll wipe down the top of the wardrobe. There must be lots of dust up there.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Aaahh——choo!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Oops, something fell down?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It's... a bunch of metal tags?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: These are.... name plates.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Name plates? Like the ID cards we have at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yes. Soldiers in the army get these plates issued with their name and unit number, for identification.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ah, really.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Can I see them?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Take a look.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: A... lan. Ju..... an. Jo.... se. I can read the names, but I can't make sense of these abbreviations...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Those indicate some things about the units they served in. Don't worry about them.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: If you have their name plates, does that mean they're...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yes. They're all dead.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh. So, were, were they important people to you?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Important...?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Colonel, your men died bravely.
Don't grieve for them. Their deaths have saved my career, and yours. You won't be reprimanded by the brass.
An investigation? No one will remember these things.
The truth? Colonel, people need pretty, or at least decent results. They don't care about the truth.
Colonel, remember your place. And don't forget who it was who raised you up from a common soldier to the command you hold today!
I didn't know them well. We barely spoke.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But yes. They are important to me.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: ........We're just about done cleaning. Come here.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Um, did I do something wrong, Instructor?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: No. I wasn't trying to hide them. That's why they were just kind of left up there.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But your questions got me thinking. So I want to talk to you two.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh, well, I'm honored!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Relax. Just have a seat.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I will tell you about my past at some point, but not now.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: For now, I just want to ask you a question.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: What do you think is the defining characteristic of a soldier?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ah? Is this... a test?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: No. There are no wrong answers.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Let's see, um.... combat proficiency?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Most people learn to fight. The operators here all do, and you two will. It's not something unique.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Is it being able to use some kind of awesome weapon?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It's true that many manufactured weapons are readily accessible to the military....
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But as you've seen here at Rhodes Island, there's always people who have other ways of acquiring such things.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: There's a lot of them?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yes.... That is a big one, the military usually has a numerical advantage unmatched by civilian organizations.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Rhodes Island today can only compare the standing army of maybe a backwater nomadic city in a small country.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Whaa? I thought Rhodes Island was really powerful...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: For a non-governmental organization, Rhodes Island has done very well for itself. But we couldn't dream of challenging a state.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But we have such amazing operators. Like Skyfire, she goes 'swoosh' with her staff and everything goes 'fwoom!'
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: But there's only so much you can do in the face of an overwhelming numbers.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Do you remember Gus, from the garrison? He was the toughest guy there by far, but if a dozen men ganged up on him...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Exactly. Numbers change the calculation even for a mediocre combatant. One Beagle couldn't take on Skyfire. But what about ten, or a hundred Beagles? Think about it.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: A- a hundred mes? We- we could crush Skyfire...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Sorry, Skyfire....
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Heh. Exactly. The number of times a lone individual has used her individual strength to influence warfare on a national scale is zero. In the entire recorded history of human conflict.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Anyway.... To digress a little, there's a reason I haven't been systematically explaining the Army to you in your prep courses. There's just no value to it.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: My greatest hope is that you'll never have a chance to apply any of this knowledge. This little lesson here is completely voluntary.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: So numbers aren't the answer either?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Well, it's an answer, but it's more of a descriptor of the military itself, rather than a soldier.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Hmmm....
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Um. Is it following orders?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: What makes you say that?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I just thought back to our time at the garrison. The captain said that as a soldier, you have to follow orders no matter what.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Huh? I got it right!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: You did. The defining characteristic of a soldier is obedience to the chain of command.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: There's a saying: the best soldier is one who can't think. An army does not need soldiers to think. Only to follow orders.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But isn't that kind of cruel?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: War is cruel. And if you must engage in it, giving up thought could be a kind of relief.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But....
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Isn't it cruel that you have these questions at all? Aren't soldiers human?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Obviously, a soldier is not a machine. He comes closer to death than anyone, and he knows better than anyone exactly what it is he is facing.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Can a soldier still muster up morale when he knows he's carrying out an incredibly stupid order?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I think... no?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Of course not. So when faced with such a situation, you have two choices. Do you know what they are?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: One is to prevent the soldier from noticing the order is incredibly stupid.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But that's difficult. The men on the front lines know exactly what kind of danger they are facing. You can't fool them.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: If you could, you could've made a better choice.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And that other choice is to just issue the correct orders.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: It may sound a bit silly, but it's the truth. How else do you get a soldier to surrender his inclination to question orders?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: How do you get him to relax, and trust in his command?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: It's simple. Just issue convincing, correct orders from the beginning.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But not everyone makes the right choice.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: After leaving the Autonomous Government, I moved to join the Resistance. But in the end I left. Because it wasn't any different there.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Woah. Instructor Dobermann even joined the Resistance?!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Yes. There's a picture in the second drawer under the wardrobe. Take a look
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Wowww. You looked so cool back then, Instructor.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I wanna see!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Woah. She did!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Put it back when you're done.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Things didn't go well there either. And eventually I left Bolívar and came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: My expectations were low.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But I was pleasantly surprised.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: A soldier knows when he's been given a stupid order, but he may not know what to do about it.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: That's another reason you need the right orders.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And Rhodes Island provides those.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: (whispering) Fang, do you get what she's talking about?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: (whispering) Kinda...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Don't worry about it too much. It's just me waxing philosophical.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: The main point here is you could stand to appreciate Rhodes Island a bit more.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You can safely give yourselves to Rhodes Island. Even if you don't think about what you're fighting for, you won't lose anything.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: There's an age old question: If we know we have to move forward, but forward is always in front of us, how do we know which way to move?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: There's no answer to that question. But you can at least trust in Rhodes Island when they tell you which way is forward. You can't go wrong moving that way.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Trust in Rhodes Island.... I think... I think I get what you're trying to tell us.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Yeah. Basically, Rhodes Island is a good place?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: ........Heh heh. Yeah. That's about it.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: It's an pie-in-the-sky paradise that a few idealists are desperately trying to keep going, for the sake of a little hope.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I know Rhodes Island is good... But is it really that good...?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Heh heh. It might take a while for you girls to realize it.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: All right, that's enough cleaning and chattering. It's time for you two to get some chow.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ah! Oh no! It's almost 1!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Yep. Thanks for helping me clean up. You have something to eat. I'll be right along.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Okay, thanks for the lesson, Instructor Dobermann. I need some time to digest it.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Me too!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Don't take it too seriously.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Also, I changed my mind. I think I might put this on one of my tests.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And if you two feed me back exactly what I just said, you get a zero.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Aaaaagh! No way!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I- I'll think very carefully about it! Thanks again for your lesson today, Instructor!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Instructor, huh.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Somehow, I'm getting used to teaching.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I've had many students, some of whom have long surpassed me. And others have bright futures.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I've found a new purpose in Rhodes Island. And I'm willing to believe in the future that Amiya and Dr. Kal'tsit have painted for me, but....
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Alan.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Juan.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Jose.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: My roots are still in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I'll go back, someday, and see for myself.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Someday.
attributes.name: Dobermann
